Module org.autogui

Package org.autogui.swing.log

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GuiSwingLogEntry
    a log-entry supporting GUI rendering, managed by GuiSwingLogManager
    GuiSwingLogEntry.LogEntryRenderer
    the renderer interface
    GuiSwingLogManager.GuiSwingLogView
    methods of the interface might happen outside of the event thread
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GuiSwingLogEntryException
    a log-entry for an exception with supporting GUI rendering
    GuiSwingLogEntryException.ExceptionExpandAction
    an action for expanding stack-trace of an exception entry
    GuiSwingLogEntryException.ExceptionMessageRenderer
    a renderer for an exception message
    GuiSwingLogEntryException.ExceptionStackTraceRenderer
    a renderer for a stack-trace lines
    GuiSwingLogEntryException.GuiSwingLogExceptionRenderer
    a renderer for exception stack-traces
    GuiSwingLogEntryException.StackTraceAttributeSet
    a set of attributes for stack traces
    GuiSwingLogEntryException.StackTraceAttributesForLine
    attribute info.
    GuiSwingLogEntryProgress
    a log-entry of a progress bar
    GuiSwingLogEntryProgress.GuiSwingLogProgressRenderer
    a renderer for a progress entry
    GuiSwingLogEntryProgress.ProgressMessageRenderer
    a renderer for a progress message
    GuiSwingLogEntryProgress.ProgressStatusRenderer
    a renderer for progress status
    GuiSwingLogEntryProgress.ProgressStopAction
    an action for terminating a progress bar entry
    GuiSwingLogEntryString
    a log-entry of a string message with supporting GUI rendering
    GuiSwingLogEntryString.GuiSwingLogStringRenderer
    a string log-entry renderer
    GuiSwingLogEntryString.LineInfoHead
    line info.
    GuiSwingLogList
    a list component for displaying log entries
    GuiSwingLogList.FindState
    a mutable state type for searching
    GuiSwingLogList.GuiSwingLogEventDispatcher
    the event handler for log-entries in the list
    GuiSwingLogList.GuiSwingLogListModel
    the list model for the log-list component
    GuiSwingLogList.LogListClearAction
    the action for clearing the log-list
    GuiSwingLogList.LogListCopyTextAction
    the action for copying texts of log-entries
    GuiSwingLogList.LogListInsertResult
    result information of an addition
    GuiSwingLogList.LogListSaveAction
    the action for saving a log list to a file
    GuiSwingLogList.LogTextFindAdapter
    the key-handler for starting searching
    GuiSwingLogManager
    a log-manager supporting Swing GUI
    GuiSwingLogManager.GuiSwingLogRenderer
    a log-entry renderer for a list and a status-bar
    GuiSwingLogManager.GuiSwingLogWindow
    a window for displaying log-list
    GuiSwingLogManager.LogWindowShowAction
    an action for showing the log-list, displayed on a status-bar
    GuiSwingLogStatusBar
    a status-bar for displaying a last log-entry
    GuiSwingLogStatusBar.EventDispatcher
    a dispatcher delegating to GuiSwingLogStatusBar.dispatch(MouseEvent)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GuiSwingLogEntry.ContainerType
    type of a rendering component
